title: Four shot during gunbattle near Westport Sunday morning
content:
Four people suffered non-life-threatening injuries early Sunday when a gunbattle broke out near Westport.
Police arrested three people in connection with the shootings and found three guns. It was unclear what precipitated the violence, police said.
Anyone with information about the shootings is asked to call the TIPS Hotline at 816-474-TIPS (474-8477).
Robert A. Cronkleton, bcronkleton@kcstar.com and Matt Campbell, mcampbell@kcstar.com
